page.title: 12CLUBS & EVENTS IN WGC.
page.content: Sporting events in our area are covered by the {Gosling Stadium,Herts {Squash Centre,}& {Stanborough Sailing {Lakes. }The Stadium caters for all popular sports,has a dry ski slope & a banked cycle track.The close links with cycling are reflected by the fact that a stage of the {Milk Race } finishes in the town centre. The Squash Centre has snooker & table-tennis tables. The Stanborough Lakes has a sailing area and boating and canoeing facilities for children. Childrens activities are organised during the school holidays by these centres. There are also{Brownies, {Guides,Cubs & Scouts }troops in the area. Religious clubs like {Crusaders {and Girls & Boys Brigade }are held weekly.A full list of all clubs in the area is available in the local library.
